tagline: LLM application design with honest evaluation, production guardrails, and hype-free model selection
pros: Model evaluation on actual tasks — benchmarks, not vibes, drive recommendations
Full LLM architecture: RAG pipelines, agent frameworks, multi-model orchestration
Guardrails built in: hallucination detection, prompt injection defense, output validation
Cost-aware model routing — right-sizes model power to query complexity
cons: Doesn't build the surrounding application or manage data pipelines
LLM systems require ongoing monitoring — not a build-and-forget solution
Honest assessments may disappoint stakeholders expecting AI to solve everything

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
